Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>闇の力<White>って、<Yellow>聖者の力<White>なのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: So is the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> the <Yellow>Power of the Saints<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは<Yellow>聖なるもの<White>と崇め、 ガジュマは<Yellow>忌むべきもの<White>と恐れてるのよね。
Entry.EnglishText: The Huma revere it as something <Yellow>sacred<White>, while the Gajuma fear it as an <Yellow>abomination<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: もし、<Blue>闇の力<White>が<Yellow>聖者の力<White>だとしたら…… <Yellow>聖者<White>って、何者なのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: So if the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> really is the <Yellow>Power of the Saints<White>... Then just who were the <Yellow>Saints<White>?
